ygData.subject: Re: Hero or Kamakazi Pilot
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yup, be aware that different mobs move at different speeds, and some of them can keep up with you and your drum at lower levels.  Some of them cast SoW on
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 3 Sep 1999 John.Curry@... wrote:

> quarter, just as the Bard and the Ranger dropped. By this time I had my
> drum in hand and Selo's playing, I whacked the Brownie and headed for the
> Greater Fay zone. Much to my surprise, I could not out-run him by much, and
> he stayed on my tail all the way to the zone, where I got out with a sliver

Yup, be aware that different mobs move at different speeds,
and some of them can keep up with you and your drum at lower
levels. Some of them cast SoW on themselves. Others just
seem to have a higher normal rate of movement (Lockjaw, all
crocs and caimans, Mammoth the grizzly, etc). Don't get
overconfident in your ability to run away from anything.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
